Package Server.game.cell

Class ShipsCell

java.lang.Object
Server.game.cell.Cell
Server.game.cell.ShipsCell
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ShipsCell extends Cell implements Serializable
Represents a cell on the game board that may contain a ship. Stores information about ship presence, hit status, and ship assignment. Extends Cell and implements Serializable for object serialization.
See Also:
